Heritage VideoMeet How to Login app ? Others Settings Support Contact LOGIN HELP bdu13ij0c1pt9kx
//help page
-> Enter Correct UserId (EmailAddress), Unique_ID, Password to login into the app.
-> For Resetting Your Password Please Contact to Admin.
-> For Viewing Your Profile Details, Click on Floating Icon on HomePage and Select Profile.
-> Click on Logout Icon.
-> To secure Meeting, Enter a Strong password. To add on Password check Settings.
-> After Joining in Meeting, Click on Chat Option to Set and Display Your Name.
-> After Generating AutoId click on Schedule Button to select Date, Time, and Write Subject Name ( Optional ) to Share Meeting code on Your Preference Basis.
-> Click on AutoId to Generate Meeting ID.
-> After Joining in Meeting Click on 3dots > More Options > Exit/Enable Tile View according to your Need.
-> Enter Meeting Id Accurately to Join OR Generate an AutoId to Join.
-> Lobby Mode is a Feature which lets you Protect your Meeting by only Allowing people to enter after a Formal Approval by a Host. To turn on this feature check Settings. \t\n\n \** For Moderator Issue, If you are Enabling this Feature then Must add Meeting Password, Remember it if you Leave after turned on this Feature then You can\'t Rejoin Again if You haven\'t Meeting Password. \**
-> Low Bandwidth Mode is a Feature in which user only receives Audio and Screen Sharing. To turn on this feature check Settings.
